title: can we talk about how toxic nasus slow is???
body: if rito is gonna go on and on about "toxic design" and then cite fiora taric and stuff, can we change nasus slow???? its oppresive in lane if u cant straight up fuck him over and late game its literally an extended clickshot stun which is impossible to get away from without qss.

replies.body: Nasus's slow is as toxic as a well done cheeseburger. That's to say, it's not.

you want me to build qss on cassiopia?

> [{quoted}](name=DEKInw,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ErT9ErkU,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2016-09-15T20:50:45.434+0000)
>
> you want me to build qss on cassiopia?

No you can just take the entirety of the wither. If your team's tanks/juggernauts aren't completely retarded nasus is a champion that takes minimal effort to peel. As cassiopeia you're not reliant on attack speed in any way shape or form so just poison nasus and go to town with your twin fangs.

Also, wither is usually best used on the ADC, not mages, since as I said before, mages dont rely on AS so only half of the wither is going to work. It's more efficient and worthwhile to wither an adc.

Fully agreed. Seriously the thing is a clickshot 99% 3 second slow at max rank. For comparison, so few other slows even are 50%, and not one that's over 60% lasts any longer than a second, even all slows on ultimate abilities. It's basically "Unless you're Kog'Maw with W, you're dead." And next patch, they're changing him so he doesn't get 5.0 attack speed anymore, so even that is only until the next patch. Only way to deal with him is to kill him before he gets into range to slow, but if you're an ADC and in range to basic attack, you're probably in range to get slowed.

Teamates can also cc him, knock him back, use utility skills to save you, and generaly pull someones butt out of the fire.  Without his slow Nasus would be one of if not THE worst cjampions in the game.
Hop a wall-> Nasus walks away a very sad demon dog.
agree. The only thing you can do is pray to the lol gods you can shut him down early game.
